guide_modal.title: Welcome!
guide_modal.subtitle: Ready to see how easy it is to calculate your trade size?
guide_modal.description: Example: You buy a coin (BTC, ETH, etc.) with a 3% stop loss. Your balance is $1,000 and your risk is 2% (you lose $20 if stop loss is hit). This calculator gives you the correct position size. With a 3% stop loss, your risk equals 2%, or $20.
